attributes.action: Raise Awareness about the dangers of carbon monoxide poison.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Raise awareness about the dangers of Carbon Monoxide poison (CO) to the general public, medical and legal profession. Anyone who sells fuels for heating and cooking should be made to contribute a percentage of their profits. To be used for research, education, help fund support groups and provide a hospice or hospital that treats those poisoned CO and the products of combustion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
